title: Drawing, September 11, 1889
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor, white gouache on gray wove paper.
signed: Signed with monogram and dated in black ink, lower left: 1889.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: Green River from the Ferry 1889; and again at lower left: Hazy Morning Red Yellow Gray Horizon; and in graphite over the 9 of 1889: 0
description: Horizontal view of the river and sandbar in the foreground, receding diagonally to left.  Beyond, a line of castellated cliffs, with a fringe of trees at base.  Cliffs are a pale pink; river is blue, blue-gray and white; sky is white.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, September 11, 1889.
September 11, 1889. Graphite, brush and watercolor, white gouache on gray wove paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-38.
